name: Euclid's Nightmare
description:
Euclid's Nightmare is a game about deforming, collapsing and expanding space and sometimes also accessing the fourth dimension!
In this project heavily inspired by games like Portal, Superliminal and Manifold Garden you will be in the shoes of Euclid, an average business man that one night has a terrible nightmare and finds himself in a world with messed up geometry. Solve puzzles and get to the next room.

This is just a prototype for the moment that showcases the basic mechanics of the game (with more mechanics that will follow later), if you enjoyed it or want to give us your opinion follow this link:

https://forms.gle/4hdShyCSTBPaz7Y86

or write something in the box at the end of the demo.
Enjoy!

DISCLAIMER FOR COURSE STUDENTS: The form IS NOT THE SAME as the one provided by the professor, so if you want to help us some more go over to our personalised form :)

DISCLAIMER : We unfortunately had no way to test Linux and macOS versions, but we're open to helping you have a good time! If you have any issues just contact us by email at heliumgmng@gmail.com
